body_html: What do you think about adding a notice about adding screenshots if a PR changes the way the Teams App looks? My brain is not wired for CSS and I'm so much more likely to just hit "Meeeerrrrge" when I have a visual of what's going to change.
body_text: What do you think about adding a notice about adding screenshots if a PR changes the way the Teams App looks? My brain is not wired for CSS and I'm so much more likely to just hit "Meeeerrrrge" when I have a visual of what's going to change.
body: What do you think about adding a notice about adding screenshots if a PR changes the way the Teams App looks? My brain is not wired for CSS and I'm so much more likely to just hit "Meeeerrrrge" when I have a visual of what's going to change.
